messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2016
messages.msgSnippet: Ice cream is no worse for you for breakfast than most breakfast cereals. Certainly better
messages.messageBody:
<<<unless a doctor said the same was necessary for health reasons>>

Ice cream is no worse for you for breakfast than most breakfast cereals.
Certainly better for you than poptarts. Would a judge have a fit if a kid
asked for chocolate milk every day? Why would it matter if the milk were
frozen?

When Zach was little he went through a period of only eating croutons, I
mean nothing else. I was concerned and talked to a nutritionist about it
and she told me relax.
It passed.......he made ice cream today.

Julie
